prodNameC: “西門子” C-反應蛋白 2試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
C-Reative Protein 2 Reagents:
R1: 4 x 15 mL containing Glycine 170 mmol/L, Sodium Chloride 100 mmol/L, EDTA disodium salt hydrate 50 mmol/L, Sodium azide 0.09% w/v.
R2: 4 x 15 mL containing CRP antibody(rabbit)-synthetic latex, Sodium azide 0.09% w/v.
CRP 2 Calibrator: 1.0 mL/vial containing Recombinant human CRP in stabilized protein matrix, Sodium azide 0.09%.
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 使用ADVIA Chemistry系統，檢測人類血清、血漿 (肝素鋰)中的C-反應蛋白濃度。
